thread.title: BRIEF-Allstate Announces March And Q1 2018 Catastrophe Loss Estimate

title: BRIEF-Allstate Announces March And Q1 2018 Catastrophe Loss Estimate
text:
April 19, 2018 / 12:57 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Allstate Announces March And Q1 2018 Catastrophe Loss Estimate Reuters Staff 
April 19 (Reuters) - Allstate Corp: 
* ALLSTATE ANNOUNCES MARCH AND FIRST QUARTER 2018 CATASTROPHE LOSS ESTIMATE 
* ALLSTATE CORP - ESTIMATED CATASTROPHE LOSSES FOR THE MONTH OF MARCH 2018 OF $222 MILLION 
* ALLSTATE CORP - ESTIMATED CATASTROPHE LOSSES $361 MILLION, PRE-TAX FOR Q1 2018 
* ALLSTATE CORP - ESTIMATED CATASTROPHE LOSSES FOR MARCH 2018 OF $175 MILLION AFTER-TAX Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
